Description: Defending against this with Speed is upshifted.
Doing something else at the same time will be difficult or impossible.
This chip tends to cause collateral damage.
Only one Guard chip can passively benefit the user at a time.
Defending against this with Stamina is upshifted.
The chip’s effects happen instantly, and can be used while performing other actions. These do **NOT** count towards liberation mission alarm counters.
It takes extra time for this to activate. Using it at a moment’s notice is difficult or impossible.
These turn a part of the Navi into a sword! They hit hard, and some even have extra non-combat utility! Navis can **parry** with these chips.
These alter the environment, either by creating new terrain or destroying what’s already there.
These are melee-focused chips that do less damage, but often have a wide range of effects! Navis can **parry** with these chips.
These chips tend to move your Navi, typically into Close range of your target! Downshift defense rolls if used below listed range.
These chips are powerful projectiles! They can be fired beyond the listed range, but the defense roll is downshifted.
These create something to assist the Navi, whether it be a tool, a specialized Virus, or even cover!
These chips boost the Navi's abilities, and create debilitating effects!
These chips are similar to Shot chips, these are more difficult to use but carry powerful effects!
These chips create explosive and/or wide attacks. All **Close** to the target get hit too, potentially including the user.
These Viruses deal high amounts of damage at range, typically using Sense or Affinity.
These Viruses hinder Navis to make them vulnerable to other attackers.
These Viruses are durable and melee-focused, needing to get up close to be a threat.
These Viruses aid other enemies, protecting them and boosting their abilities.
These Viruses introduce environmental obstacles and threats.
The Virus hovers a few inches off the ground, avoiding grounded attacks and some terrain.
The Virus is able to freely fly through the air.
The Virus acts according to simplistic programming. It can be hacked with Coding.
The Virus cannot move by itself. However, other things may be able to move it.
